r: The tale of an Italian boy and his Italian friends and an Italian game they play together.

p.b:
[img]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/MSPFA%20COVER%20PAGE.png[/img]

[b][size=16]AN ADAPTATION
OF THE ORIGINAL HOMESTUCK
FOR [color=#bd1c00]ITALIAN[/color]-[color=#4a804a]AMERICAN[/color] AUDIENCES[/size][/b]

[spoiler open="CONTENT WARNING" close="I WAS WARNED"]
[center]<shake>[size=20][color=#bd1c00]ITALIAN[/color] [color=#4a804a]CONTENT[/color][/size]</shake>
[/spoiler][/center]

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0001.gif[/img]

A young Italian man stands in his bedroom. This day, the 4th of January, has no particular significance to this young man. It is definitely not his birthday. But seeing as it’s been a little over thirteen years since he was given life, it’s about time for him to be given a name!

What will the name of this young man be?

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0002.gif[/img]

That's definitely not it!

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0003.gif[/img]

[i]Belíssimo![/i] The perfect name!

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0004.png[/img]

Your name is TONY. It is past your BEDTIME. 
You CANNOT SLEEP as you are in one of your frequent BAD MOODS. 
You have only one INTEREST, and no others. As far back as you can remember, you have always wanted to be a GANGSTER. You consider yourself fairly STREET SMART, which you owe to your steady diet of MAFIA MOVIES. You are an avid collector of DIGNIFIED HATS and PRICEY CIGARS, the essential tools of a soon-to-be MADE MAN. 

You occasionally play GAMES. But you don't like them or anything.

What will you do?

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0005.png[/img]

It is not your birthday, so nothing in this room 
could possibly be a BIRTHDAY PRESENT. 
Your birthday was thirteen years ago, and it wasn’t today.
There is a MYSTERY BOX in here you haven’t opened yet, though.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0006.png[/img]

Not a chance, pal. 
This is the last MYSTERY BOX they sent you after you unsubscribed. You used to waste all your money on these things. The ones you opened never had anything good inside. 

You're getting frustrated just thinking about it. 
Whatever’s in there is [i]totalmente[/i] irrelevant to you. Capeesh?

p.c: Tony: Smoke cigar to calm down.
p.b:
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0007c.gif[/img]

You’re not allowed to smoke PRICEY CIGARS, or any cigars for that matter. Who ever heard of a thirteen-year-old smoking?

You do like the smell though, so you often burn them to calm down.

p.c: Tony: Burn cigar to calm down.
p.b:
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0008.gif[/img]

You’d prefer not to right now. 
You’re starting to think they might have something to do with your 
WET COUGH, which has been getting worse lately. 

You do need to find a way to calm down, though. Your BAD MOOD is progressing and you’re starting to feel straight up [i]incazzato.[/i]

<video src="https://va.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_t8hjncus7d1amudex.mp4" width="650" height="450" autoplay></video>
You consult BIG MOUTH BILLY BASS.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0009.png[/img]

As expected, he gives you the same old song and dance.

You do feel a little better, though.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0010.png[/img]

That’s your BROKEN SMOKE DETECTOR. The guy started singing like a canary every time you lit up a stogie. With a mouth like that, it was only a matter of time before someone whacked him. 

WISE GUYS like you live by OMERTÀ - the code of silence.

p.c: Tony: Pick up broken smoke detector.
p.b:
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0011.gif[/img]

You CAPTCHALOGUE the BROKEN SMOKE DETECTOR in your SYLLADEX. 

You hope it doesn’t take hours of hilarious inventory management slapstick to get it back out.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0012.gif[/img]

You reflect on your favorite MAFIA MOVIES and the many lessons they’ve taught you.
 
In only a few short years you’ll be old enough to join a CREW. Once they see what you’re capable of, you’ll be a MADE MAN in no time at all. A lesser man would stop there, but not you. Your blood, sweat, tears, and sheer [i]audacia[/i] will get you to the top. Beyond the top. You know in your heart you will one day become the CAPO DEI CAPI.

And once you’re the BOSS, everyone who ever looked down on you, disrespected you, messed with you, sent you to your room...
They’re going to be sorry. They’re all going to fucking pay.
They'll all come groveling to you and...

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0013.gif[/img]

One of your friends is bugging you. You were just getting to the good part of the fantasy, too. You’ll have to start over later.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0014a.png[/img]
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0014c.gif[/img]

You sit at your COMPUTER and open BLATERARE to see who messaged you. 

This chat client is advertised as “for Italians only,” but they didn’t actually check when you made your account. Personally, you would rather use a more modern chat client, but one of your friends refuses to use anything else. What BLATERARE lacks in features, it makes up for in national pride.

Looks like one of your PAISANOS is messaging you.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0015.png[/img]

[spoiler open="BLA-BLA!" close="BASTA!"]
[b]tintedCasanova [color=#4A4A80][TC][/color] blatera con caponesGoombah [color=#7d2f2f][CG][/color] @ 21:37 PM[/b]
[color=#4A4A80]
TC: hey.
TC: are you awake
TC: who am i kidding its not even 10. of course you are[/color]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: Yeah, I’m up.[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: okay sick. need you to play a game with us[/color]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: I’m not supposed to play games right now.
CG: It’s past my bedtime. [/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: lmao. cmon man
TC: not like youre asleep anyway
TC: look. alba really wants to play this thing. shes insisting[/color]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: I told you, it’s past my bedtime.[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: shes been having a hard time lately
TC: and given her timezone theres never a convenient time for everyone anyway.
TC: could you just do this for her[/color]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: Fine.[/color]
[/spoiler]

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0016.png[/img]

[spoiler open="BLA-BLA!" close="BASTA!"]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: What’s the game?[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: idk honestly dude. she sent us all copies[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: have you checked your mail today[/color]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: She mailed us copies? She doesn’t even like games.
CG: And it’s Sunday. There’s no mail on Sunday.[/color] 
[color=#4a4a80]TC: shes being fucking weird about it. i know. all this stuff occurred to me 
TC: look. i just need you to humor me. and go check your mail right now [/color]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: I can’t. I got in trouble today.
CG: Got sent to my room a few hours ago. I’m trying not to push my luck right now.[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: holy shit
TC: how do you not feel embarrassed telling me this stuff. 
TC: your mom is probably asleep!
TC: just march out there and check! your fucking mail![/color]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: Fine. Stop busting my balls.
CG: I’ll go check.[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: thank you. [/color]
[/spoiler]

p.c: Tony: March out there and check your mail.
p.b:
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0017.png[/img]

You’re not going to “march out there” if your MOM is up and about.
You don’t need that kind of heat. 

You don’t hear anything through the door. No loud music, no shuffling of feet, no muffled beatboxing, and no yelping. Sounds like the LIVING ROOM is clear. You’re pretty sure you can pull this off.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0020b.gif[/img]

You make it about halfway to the MAIL SLOT without being spotted. 

It's quiet out here. Too quiet.

<video src="https://va.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_t8jctm9XQU1amudex_720.mp4" width="650" height="450" autoplay></video>

You almost make it to the MAIL SLOT.

Whoops! You trip the motion sensor on the VIDEO DISCBABY.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0022.png[/img]

You force the VIDEO DISCBABY shut. The music stops.
You hope your MOM didn’t hear that.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0023c.gif[/img]

You see no mail on the floor. You had a feeling nothing had been pushed through your MAIL SLOT today. This all but proves it. 

Hold on. You hear someone outside.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0024b.gif[/img]

Someone slams an envelope through your MAIL SLOT with incredible force. Probably a really strong mailman.

Your MOM definitely heard that. You’d better grab it quick!

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0025d.gif[/img]

Your MOM confiscates it before you can even react.
She is a lot faster than you.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0026.gif[/img]

You haul ass back to your room and shut the door.
Better let your friend know there’s been a complication.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0027.png[/img]

[spoiler open="BLA-BLA!" close="BASTA!"]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: Okay you were right. There was mail today.
CG: I don’t know how, but it showed up the exact moment I checked.
CG: But my mom grabbed it. I don’t think she’s going to give it to me while I’m grounded.
CG: Also, the delivery guy kinda manhandled it. [/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: come the fuck on man. 
TC: how did your mom manage to intercept it in like 30 seconds[/color]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: That’s my fault. I accidentally turned on the Video Discbaby, and I think she heard the music.[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: look
TC: i dont want to know what that is.
TC: youre going back out there and getting that game[/color]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: Dude, there’s no way she’s going to give it back.
CG: What could possibly be so important about playing this game right now?[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: alba went out of her way to send you a copy at 10pm on a sunday.
TC: shes going to be heartbroken if you don’t play.[/color]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: Okay, well I’m sorry, but there’s not much I can do to get it back![/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: go attack your mom[/color]
[/spoiler]

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0028.gif[/img]

[spoiler open="BLA-BLA!" close="BASTA!"]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: I don’t think that’s a good idea.[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: maybe you get punished so much because you dont stand up for yourself
TC: ever think of that.[/color]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: You really think that’s it?[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: yeah
TC: i do. [/color]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: Well, shit. 
CG: If I just start fighting back, physically, I won’t get grounded as often?[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: yeah man. im pretty sure thats the move
TC: have you allocated your strife specibus yet[/color]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: No. I’m waiting until I’m old enough to get a tommygun.[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: you cant get those anymore.[/color]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: You can’t?[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: youre never going to get a fucking tommygun.
TC: go allocate your specibus now.[/color]
[/spoiler]

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0029.gif[/img]

You open your unallocated STRIFE SPECIBUS.
You were really holding out for a tommygun. Oh well. 

You start scanning your room for a decent weapon.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0030.png[/img]

You could definitely use these MATCHES as a weapon, but you’re not trying to burn your whole apartment down. Better not.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0031.png[/img]

You could use a GUITAR as a weapon if there was actually one in there. 
Unfortunately, there isn’t a GUITAR in there. And you’ve lost the KEY.

This gives you an idea, though.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0032C.gif[/img]

You hoist your GUITAR CASE towards your STRIFE SPECIBUS. 
It’s pretty heavy on account of all the stuff you keep in it. 
Heavy is good. It’ll be great for bashing your MOM. 

WHOOPS!

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0033a.png[/img]
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0033b.png[/img]

You watch helplessly as the HAT RACK dumps its entire load of 
DIGNIFIED HATS into your STRIFE SPECIBUS.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0034b.gif[/img]

Your STRIFE SPECIBUS instantly allocates its KIND ABSTRATUS to MANYHATSKIND. 
You’re locked in.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0035.png[/img]

[spoiler open="BLA-BLA!" close="BASTA!"]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: God DAMN IT!
CG: I’m never going to be able to use any cool weapons, and it’s YOUR fault!
CG: My stupid thing got allocated to fucking “manyhatskind!”[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: lmao. did you dump a bunch of hats in there
TC: how is that my fault.[/color]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: You made me allocate it! I was saving it for later!
CG: I can’t even use a hat as a weapon! How am I supposed to become a made man now?
CG: You fucked my life up, dude.[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: ok calm down. gimme a second.
TC: im looking for videos of guys using hats as weapons.
TC: dude, bingo
TC: you could be like hatjob from james bond 007.
TC: [url]https://tinyurl.com/mpa8jhdr[/url][/color]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: No, I couldn’t! He’s using a bladed hat, and those don’t exist!
CG: Also, his name was fucking ODDJOB!!![/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: okay. sorry.
TC: maybe they could call you hatjob.[/color]

[b]caponesGoombah [color=#7d2f2f][CG][/color] partido @ 22:12 PM[/b]

[color=#4a4a80]TC: wait im sorry.
TC: please go get the game.[/color]

[/spoiler]

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0036.png[/img]

You look at the selection of hats in your arsenal.
You can't tolerate this humiliation a second longer. You’ve had enough.

It's time to deal with your anger in a more mature, dignified fashion. You're gonna go beat the shit out of your MOM.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0037B.gif[/img]

You arm yourself with your PLASTIC NOVELTY FEDORA and dart across the LIVING ROOM. Looks like she’s not here. Must be in the KITCHEN.

You’re feeling a little nervous now.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0038.gif[/img]

You quietly sidle into the KITCHEN.
[i]Marona mia[/i]. She’s just in here. Silently leaning.

Doesn’t look like she’s noticed you yet.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0039b.gif[/img]

You launch your PLASTIC NOVELTY FEDORA at your poor unsuspecting MOM.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0040.gif[/img]

Uh oh.
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0041d.gif[/img]
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0042e.gif[/img]

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0043.png[/img]

You haven't been dropped on your head that hard in years. 
Thirteen years, actually.

You make fleeting eye contact with the SHELF JACKSON.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0044b.gif[/img]

You just lie there quietly while your MOM gathers her things and departs for the CASINO.
Looks like you really pissed her off.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0045.png[/img]

The ringing in your ears subsides.
You’ve got the apartment all to yourself.  Time to find that game.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0046a.png[/img]
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0046b.png[/img]

You check the usual hiding spots.
Looks like your MOM didn’t hide it in her CD PILE, or under her SPEAKERS, or even behind the FRAMED JACKSON.

It’s not under the COUCH either.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0047.png[/img]

You search the entire KITCHEN. No dice.
Maybe she hid it in the BATHROOM?

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0048a.png[/img]
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0048b.png[/img]

You enter the BATHROOM. You don’t like being in here unless it's absolutely necessary.

Oh. There’s the MANILA ENVELOPE. She wedged it underneath BATHROOM JACKSON.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0049c.gif[/img]

You know exactly how to retrieve it.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0050.png[/img]

Bummer! You can’t captchalogue the MANILA ENVELOPE because your STRIFE SPECIBUS ate up all the empty cards in your SYLLADEX when all your DIGNIFIED HATS fell in there. The only remaining card in your SYLLADEX is holding your BROKEN SMOKE DETECTOR!

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0051.gif[/img]

You’ve always hated retrieving things from your SYLLADEX. 
Your FETCH MODUS is degrading, to say the least.

p.c: Tony: Just get on with it.
p.b:
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0052.gif[/img]

You joylessly remove the BROKEN SMOKE DETECTOR from your SYLLADEX.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0053.gif[/img]

You captchalogue the MANILA ENVELOPE and store it in your SYLLADEX. 
Now you can move on with your life.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0054.png[/img]
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0054d.png[/img]

You head back to your room and open the MANILA ENVELOPE.

SBOIB? You stare at the shoddy cover art.
This doesn't even look like a real game.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0055.png[/img]

Looks like BLATERARE has been churning out popups while you were busy. Gotta close these first.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0056.gif[/img]

You insert the SBOIB DISC and run the program. You skip past a bunch of boring options for hosting a server. 
It starts running some weird bullshit.

p.c: Tony: Tell your friend it’s gaming time.
p.b:
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0057.png[/img]

[spoiler open="BLA-BLA!" close="BASTA!"]
caponesGoombah [color=#7d2f2f][CG][/color] blatera con tintedCasanova [color=#4a4a80][TC][/color] @ 22:45 PM

[color=#7d2f2f]CG: Hey! Good news!
CG: I got the game, and I’m pretty sure I don’t even have a bedtime anymore!
CG: I think my mom respects me now![/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: thank god man. we were starting to get worried you wouldnt make it. 
TC: did you get it installed.[/color]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: Uh, it’s running something right now. Honestly it looks like Italian malware. 
CG: Why is Alba mailing this out? This isn’t her thing.
CG: I tried to help her with a gameboy emulator once and that was way too confusing for her.[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: listen man thats a great point. 
TC: and we can talk about that later
TC: for now just leave it running. i need to connect to you as a ‘server player’
TC: thatll take a few mins. and i have a couple other things to do.
TC: sit tight.[/color]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: Whatever. I’ll just ask her about it if you’re gonna be like that.[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: sorry man im just in a hurry. 
TC: she wants to be left alone until all of us are ready to play[/color]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: All of us? Who else is playing?[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: pauls gonna be joining[/color]
[color=#7d2f2f]CG: I really don’t like playing games with Paul.[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: keep your chin up bud.
TC: back in five[/color]
[/spoiler]

p.c: Tony: Read a book while you wait.
p.b:
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0058ab.png[/img]
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0058b.png[/img]

You open up the GAMER MEMOIR that’s been gathering dust at the foot of your bed. You don’t even like games, so maybe this will get you in the gaming mood. 

Never mind. This is pretty dry. It’s also mostly about MARIO, which is for BABIES. You don’t play games for BABIES. Anyone who plays MARIO is a BABY, and you would never read a memoir written by a BABY. 
So you stop.

p.c: Tony: Read another book while you wait.
p.b:
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0059a.png[/img]
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0059b.png[/img]

You crack open AL CAPONE DOES MY HOMEWORK. When you bought this, you figured it was going to be about a kid gangster who shows such promise that he is promoted ABOVE EVEN THE BOSS, commanding the respect of Capone and forcing him to do his homework.

Instead, it’s about some lame kid who lives in Alcatraz and begs Capone for favors. The kid doesn’t even harbor any ambitions of joining the COSA NOSTRA. Capone hasn’t even appeared yet. This book is a huge waste of your time.

You decide to spend the next twenty minutes reading it.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0060c.gif[/img]

A young Italian man stands in his bedroom. Earlier today, this young man received some distressing information. A few minutes ago, he ordered his autistic friend to go attack his mother. While this was not something that this young man would ordinarily do, and certainly not something he would be proud of, he has found himself in a situation. The situation demands action. This young man is no stranger to action, but right now, he would just like a moment to chill out. Is that okay with you? Can you stomach that?

p.c: Render yourself in a less symbolic manner.
p.b:
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0061finalb.gif[/img]

The young man obliges. He's feeling so... [i][color=#ff5500][b][i]MEDITERRANEAN.[/i][/b][/color][/i]

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0062.png[/img]

The young man switches back to a more user-friendly palette. 
See? Sometimes things are the way they are for a reason. But you just had to go and rock the boat.

Since you want something to happen so bad, why don’t you tell us this kid’s name?

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0063.gif[/img]

You got the wrong guy, pal.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0064.gif[/img]

That’s what’s up.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0065.png[/img]

Your name is JOEY. As mentioned, you are under a lot of PRESSURE. You are beginning to relax with the help of VAPORIZED NICOTINE, which is in no short supply. You have a handful of INTERESTS. You are completely fucking obsessed with CONSPICUOUS CONSUMPTION of the PRACTICAL, the AESTHETIC, and even the EPHEMERAL. You adorn yourself with SPORTS FINERIES and bind yourself in GILDED CHAINS. Your room is decorated with your favorite COLLECTOR’S PIECES and filled to the brim with your carefully-concocted GENTLEMEN’S MIASMA. 
You also enjoy FRIENDLY LITTLE BEARS.

What will you do?

p.c: Joey: Drink jug of Fanta to calm down.
p.b:
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0066.gif[/img]

There is no jug of Fanta in your room, only your trusty HUMIDIFIER. The AMBROSIA inside delights the nostrils and soothes the skin, but is never, under any circumstances, to be tasted by a mortal.

p.c: Joey: Run the humidifier to calm down.
p.b:
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0067.png[/img]

You’d prefer not to right now.
You have already filled your room with GENTLEMEN’S MIASMA once today. Any more would be pointless extravagance. 
You’re also not trying to make your WET COUGH worse.

p.c: Joey: Maybe some more vaping, then?
p.b:
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0068.gif[/img]

You’ve been vaping this entire time, see? 
It just didn’t seem worth dwelling on.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0069.png[/img]

You gaze lovingly up at your B-BALLIN’ BEARBRICK.

It doesn’t get any better than this.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0070.gif[/img]

You achieve about five seconds of total serenity before your computer interrupts you. Damn, he’s done already? You hope his mom is okay.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0071.gif[/img]

You proceed to have [url=https://mspfa.com/?s=67607&p=35]this conversation.[/url]
Huh. Looks like someone else wants a piece of you too.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0072.gif[/img]

[spoiler open="BLA-BLA!" close="BASTA!"]
augustestCensor [[color=#ca9400]AC[/color]] blatera con tintedCasanova [[color=#4a4a80]TC[/color]] @ 22:16 PM

[color=#ca9400]AC: What’s the holdup? I’ve been ready to go for a while now.[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: be patient. im wrangling tony
TC: he doesnt have his copy yet.[/color]
[color=#ca9400]AC: We can just start without him. I don’t see what the big deal is.[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: you know exactly what the big deal is paul
TC: fuck you.[/color]
[color=#ca9400]AC: Seethe.[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: just letting you know right now. if it were up to me
TC: you would not have been invited. 
TC: if you catch my drift paul[/color]
[color=#ca9400]AC: Alba invited me, you just relayed the invite because you’re a simp.
AC: Calm down. [/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: id prefer not to right now.
TC: shut up and listen.
TC: i could easily have pulled some shit and left you out of the loop. but i didnt. 
TC: is that clicking for you.
TC: youre sooo quiet now. must have clicked
TC: heres what youre going to do
TC: youre going to be on your best behavior paul
TC: even if it turns out alba is 100% full of shit and we just end up playing mario kart for six hours 
TC: youre not gonna throw any shells. no banana peels
TC: youre gonna be completely prosocial tonight. youre gonna be a little angel.
TC: okay? say fine.[/color]
[color=#ca9400]AC: Fine.[/color]
[color=#4a4a80]TC: thanks paul.[/color]

tintedCasanova [[color=#4a4a80]TC[/color]] partido @ 22:21 PM

[/spoiler]

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0073.gif[/img]

Now you need to calm down again.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0074.png[/img]

You’re not opening that window and ruining the atmosphere in here.
It couldn’t hurt to step out of the room for a few, though.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0075.png[/img]

You enter the LIVING ROOM. 

You hear some clinking. Sounds like your UNC is in the KITCHEN.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0076.png[/img]

No need to sneak around. Not like you have a bedtime. 
Bedtimes are for BABIES, and you aren't a BABY.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0077.png[/img]

It’s your UNC’s prized TOMMYGUN. 
It’s been his everyday carry for years. He takes real good care of it.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0078.png[/img]

Your UNC would probably let you shoot it if you asked, but you’re not just going to snatch it up. That’s not respectful of his belongings.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0079.gif[/img]

Your UNC’s tastes are a little more rustic than your own. 
His DECADENT DUCKS aren’t your favorite, but not an eyesore either. 
You like this one in the corner though.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0080.png[/img]

Sure enough, your UNC is in the KITCHEN, enjoying a glass of wine. 
You might as well get this over with.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0081.png[/img]

You say hey. He says hey back but doesn’t turn around. You say you’ve got to tell him something. He says shoot. You say that your friend says the world is ending. 

He says what, like the final judgement? You say it sounded a bit more secular. He asks what it is then. You say you don’t know. 
He says that’s not very convincing.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0082.png[/img]

You say your friend told you that a couple of you can survive if you play some computer game. He says that’s fucking stupid and your friend is just lonely. You say that’s true but not the point.

He says he never thought you were this gullible. You say you’re not really sure you believe it, but it’s like a really low-stakes Pascal’s Wager and you might as well get everyone to play the game, just in case. He asks which one is Pascal’s Wager again. 
You say it’s like a betting strategy for believing in god. 
He says oh yeah, he knows that one, so what’s this game anyway.

You say you don’t know, some guys dropped it off earlier. 
He says, some guys. You say yeah, some guys, and they looked connected.
He asks if the friend saying all this is that Mazzarella girl. 
You say yeah. 

He says well, shit.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0083.png[/img]

He says if it’s all the same to you, he’s gonna do some gaming at the CASINO, just in case the world ends. You say that’s fine, the world’s probably not going to end. He says yeah, but just in case.

Then he says maybe you two could fight real quick, like old times. 
You say sure. 
He says think fast.
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0084c.gif[/img]

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0085.gif[/img]

He says that was pretty good. You say yeah.

He says you’re a good kid but he wishes you weren’t into all that [i]moolinyan[/i] stuff. You say that’s pretty disrespectful and not really any of his business.

He says well you’re a good nephew irregardless, and he's real proud.
You say he’s a real good uncle. 

He says he's gonna head out to the CASINO now.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0086b.png[/img]

Your UNC heads out to the CASINO.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0087.gif[/img]

Empty.

p.c: Joey: Get another vape from your room.
p.b:
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0088.png[/img]

You head back to your BEDROOM and start picking through your cabinet of ESSENTIAL OILS. You have a lot of options.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0089a.png[/img]
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0089b.png[/img]

You have more than one favorite. But eventually you settle on a PESTOBERRY GEEK BRICK.

p.c: Joey: Pick up the new vape.
p.b:
[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0090.gif[/img]

You captchalogue the PESTOBERRY GEEK BRICK. 

Your CHEF BOYARDEE FETCH MODUS starts compressing it into a lightweight, aesthetically pleasing CAN.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0091.gif[/img]

Once it finishes compressing, the CAN stores itself in your SYLLADEX.

You’re going to need something to open that with later.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0092.gif[/img]

You schlep to the KITCHEN and grab the CAN OPENER from the cupboard.
You promptly captchalogue the CAN OPENER.

Wait a second. Fuck.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0093.gif[/img]

You start hunting for one of your BACKUP CAN OPENERS. 
You’re pretty sure you’ve still got one floating around, you just can’t remember where.

Tony seems to be done sulking.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0094b.png[/img]

You proceed to have [url=https://mspfa.com/?s=67607&p=57][b]this conversation[/b][/url].

Oh, and look at that. There’s Alba now.

[img=650x450]https://file.garden/aVeuLycxzTDMl3fk/WOPLOCKED%20PANELS/0095.gif[/img]
